DataElement.preferredName: Eflornithine Pills Follow-up Distribution Pill Dosage Form Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Total number of Eflornithine/placebo pills dispensed to the patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Eflornithine/placebo pills dispensed to the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A difluoromethylated ornithine compound with antineoplastic activity.  Eflornithine irreversibly inhibits ornithine decarboxylase, an enzyme required for polyamine biosynthesis, thereby inhibiting the formation and proliferation of tumor cells. Polyamines are involved in nucleosome oligomerization and DNA conformation, creating a chromatin environment that stimulates neoplastic transformation of cells. This agent has been shown to induce apoptosis in leiomyoma cells. (NCI04):The quantity of a product that has been dispensed.

Concepts.definition: A difluoromethylated ornithine compound with antineoplastic activity.  Eflornithine irreversibly inhibits ornithine decarboxylase, an enzyme required for polyamine biosynthesis, thereby inhibiting the formation and proliferation of tumor cells. Polyamines are involved in nucleosome oligomerization and DNA conformation, creating a chromatin environment that stimulates neoplastic transformation of cells. This agent has been shown to induce apoptosis in leiomyoma cells. (NCI04)
The quantity of a product that has been dispensed.

Property.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:the act of going to see some person or place or thing for a short time.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
the act of going to see some person or place or thing for a short time.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric value for amount of pills.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A dose of medicine in the form of a small pellet.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A solid composed of a small, round object composed of active and/or inert ingredient(s).
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
